messages.content: I've also heard that intriguing but also kinda scary
I want to so bad it hurts. I guess I'm just scared.
Matchroom squad dismiss [NAME] as not existing anymore, the sky media influence is scary
China cheating the rest of the world is horrible for the economy and society.
I find that relatable: I too am terrified of myself.
I thought it said “now my biggest fear is the thing living inside my casket” like, *weet doo feek?!*
My point was that it’s creepy. I never said it was illegal.
I’m always weirded out whenever I see him without a beard because in my game I got the longest beard I could
He did. He needs the facial hair, and that haircut is horrible he should just shave it and start over.
Yeah it isn't the same singer. 'Don't hug me I'm scared' is voiced by [NAME], the lead singer of KKB is [NAME]
Correct. I still play NHL Faceoff 98 and I always turn that rule off, because it's terrible.
Oh. I have anxiety for her and this conversation.
His smile is so damn creepy
